com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core

Class GameConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core.GameConfiguration

  • public class GameConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the configuration for the game. It includes the EngineSettings class which are the settings for graphics and audio. This class is passed into Game as a parameter in Game.createGame()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameConfiguration(java.net.URI textureRootFolder, java.net.URI soundRootFolder, EngineSettings engineSettings)
      Constructs a new game configuration.

      • GameConfiguration

        public GameConfiguration(java.net.URI textureRootFolder,
                 java.net.URI soundRootFolder,

        Constructs a new game configuration.
        Parameters:
        textureRootFolder - URI to the folder where the textures are located
        soundRootFolder - URI to the folder where the sounds are located
        engineSettings - EngineSettings object containing the engine settings
